course_constraints.name: ltpc_requirements
course_constraints.description: LTPC (Lecture, Tutorial, Practical, Credit) hour requirements per course
course_constraints.implementation: Group courses by semester first, then ensure adequate hours assigned

course_constraints.name: semester_grouping
course_constraints.description: Courses must be grouped by semester before scheduling
course_constraints.implementation: First group courses by semester, then apply LTPC constraints

teacher_constraints.name: teacher_subject_assignment
teacher_constraints.description: Assign proper teacher for each subject according to data
teacher_constraints.implementation: First assign teacher for each subject with proper assignment given according to data

teacher_constraints.name: max_21_hour_workweek
teacher_constraints.description: Maximum 21 work hours per week per teacher
teacher_constraints.implementation: Track and limit total weekly teaching hours to 21 maximum

teacher_constraints.name: no_teacher_time_overlap
teacher_constraints.description: No overlapping time assignments for any teacher
teacher_constraints.implementation: Ensure no teacher is assigned to multiple classes at same time

room_constraints.name: lab_room_constraints
room_constraints.description: Laboratory room allocation and usage constraints
room_constraints.implementation: Allocate lab rooms for practical sessions with proper equipment

room_constraints.name: classroom_constraints
room_constraints.implementation: Allocate classrooms for lectures and tutorials

room_constraints.name: no_room_overlap
room_constraints.description: No two classes in same room at same time
room_constraints.implementation: Prevent double booking of any room at any given time instance

notes: All constraints are hard constraints (no soft constraints)
